prompts.label: One‑Liner
prompts.value: Repeat the latest instruction using one or more logically grouped, idiomatic one‑liners. Use `&&`, `|`, or subshells where appropriate. Split into multiple one‑liners if needed for clarity or UNIX best practices.

prompts.label: Drop‑In Replacement
prompts.value: Provide the full drop‑in replacement text. Match structure, logic, and intent so it can be pasted without further editing.

prompts.label: Infer Goal
prompts.value: Review the entire conversation and identify what the user is trying to achieve. Summarize the underlying goal as a single clear instruction prompt suitable for direct input into an AI model.

prompts.label: Continue
prompts.value: Continue generating the response where it was cut off. Don’t repeat previous content unless necessary for coherence.
